features: HELPS TO REDUCE UNWANTED ODOR: JilGyungYi Pro’s unique formula helps to maintain pH levels to alleviate unpleasant vaginal odor and irritation.
EXCELLENT MOISTURIZER: This feminine cleanser helps skin to retain water after each use, making skin vibrant and moisturized.
10 NATURAL INGREDIENTS: Carefully selected ingredients are excellent for removing odor for all day freshness.
HYPOALLERGIC, SAFE FOR SENSITIVE INTIMATE AREAS: Dermatologist tested and safe for all skin types.

EASY ACCESS, EASY APPLICATION: A tablet-type feminine cleanser you can bring everywhere. Use 2 tablets 1-2 times a week by dissolving in a small amount of water and applying them to intimate areas. EXTERNAL USE ONLY

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Easy to take out for travel
reviews.reviewText: This cleaning tablet is easy to take with you when traveling and going out, but you need to wait for it to melt before using it. I use it to cleanse after menstruation, and the effect is OK, but it has not achieved the effect I want.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not Efficient or Effective
reviews.reviewText: I’m not sure if I just received some bad tablets, but the JILGYUNGYI PRO Feminine Wash Tablets are not efficient or very effective.I received a box with 2 blister packs that contained of 10 tablets each.The instructions are to melt 2 tablets in 5ml of warm water. The issue is that the tablets take forever to dissolve. I mean like over an hour. I don’t know if my tablets may be bad because 1 reviewer mentioned something about the tablets fizzing. Mine did not and several other reviewers also mentioned issues with dissolving the tablet.When my tablets did finally dissolve, the solution was not what I expected or hoped for. I was expecting something more like a cream or paste, but the solution was still very fluid…watery. I used a sterile pad to apply. The instructions say to apply and rinse with no mention of how long to wait.After rinsing, I noticed really nothing and the only reason I gave 2 stars, instead of 1, is because I can’t honestly say it did not “increase skin elasticity”.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars The pills took too long to dissolve.
reviews.reviewText: This is a great idea for on the go cleansing but it just takes too long for the pills to dissolve. The current price of 49.99 for 10 washes is just way too much for the quality of it, and it has to be used immediately.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does As Advertised
reviews.reviewText: I researched JILGYUNGYI and they have been in Korea since 2009 selling mostly feminine hygiene products so they are an established company. I mainly got this to take on trips to freshen up since some of the places I go I might not get a bath or shower every day. These pills would be easy to carry with me and I would not have to carry many since it is only 2 tablets 1-2 times a week.Luckily I read the reviews about the difficulty dissolving the pills so I was ready for that issue. I used a pill cutter to cut the pills up into quarters. Then I used very hot water right out of the tap. Using this method and stirring a couple of times it took 5 minutes for the pills to completely dissolve. By then the water had cooled down enough that I was able to splash the mixture to my intimate area. It did not feel anything during the application of the product. After doing the rinse twice a week for several weeks I can say that my skin does appear to be smoother and tighter. Maybe it is because I am just paying more attention, but it does seem to make some type of difference. Not sure about any other effects such as odor control, but I did not think I had a particularly bad odor to begin with.So since I had read all the other reviews and warnings about the tablets not dissolving I was able to get around that issue or at least be prepared for it. The product did not cause me any irritation during or after application. Over several weeks the rinse did seem to help my skin as far as being smoother and softer, but I’m not sure about the other claims since I had no such issues to start. I have to say since I was able to get the pills to dissolve and the solution seem to make a positive difference I like the product overall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Clean and comfy
reviews.reviewText: These little fizzers are pretty cool! They're, like, super easy to use - just pop one in some water and whoosh, instant gentle wash for down there. No more lugging around big bottles, these travel-friendly guys fit right in my purse.They clean me up just fine, not too harsh or drying like some things can be. I love that they're pH balanced, keeps things feeling happy and healthy. My only little gripe is they disappear kinda fast, wish they lasted a tad longer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Tablets Don’t Melt & Odd Cleansing Method
reviews.reviewText: The listed ingredients made this feminine cleanser sound promising. Unfortunately, the tablets take forever to dissolve. Directions say to melt two tablets in warm water. That didn’t work, so I tried extremely hot water—even after ten minutes, the tablets weren’t completely dissolved. Who has that kind of time to add to a morning routine? Even after helping the tablets melt (by swirling/mixing), the whole application process is a messy one with questionable cleansing results.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Melts Too Slowly, Even in Hot Water
reviews.reviewText: This was a pleasant solution, non-irritating for intimate areas, cleansing, soothing. Tablets were difficult to melt, even in hot water.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Feminine wash tablets
reviews.reviewText: I really liked the idea behind these tablets. 1-2 tablets twice a week or as needed. Just put in water and watch them melt or that's what was supposed to happen. But they didn't. It took longer than anticipated for the tablets to dissolve. Not really time saving than buying something already made. I'm not at all sensitive but this actually caused some irritation for me. Could be just me, or some of the ingredients in the tablets...but unfortunately this product is not for me.
